statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode = 1234567890;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode IN (9876543210, 1234567890) ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE 'Banana%';
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, barcode FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode IN (123456789, 987654321) ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, barcode FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY barcode DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE barcode IS NOT NULL AND quantity < 20 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sale';
SELECT transaction_date, barcode FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT barcode, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location='New York';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE status='completed';
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_barcode, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE status='Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE capacity > 1000 AND manager_name='John Doe';
SELECT warehouse_id, location, manager_name FROM Warehouse ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Main';
SELECT * FROM warehouse ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT name, address FROM store WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, barcode FROM inventory JOIN barcode_mapping ON inventory.barcode = barcode_mapping.barcode WHERE barcode_mapping.type = 'Retail';
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM warehouse WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT name AS StoreName, manager AS StoreManager FROM store WHERE manager IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT scanner_model, manufacturer FROM barcode_scanners LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE action_type = 'SALE' AND transaction_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 3;

SELECT barcode_scanners.manufacturer, barcode_scanners.scanner_model, inventory_items.item_name FROM barcode_scanners INNER JOIN inventory_items ON barcode_scanners.scanner_id = inventory_items.item_id;

SELECT inventory_audit_logs.log_id, inventory_audit_logs.log_message, inventory_transactions.action_type, inventory_transactions.transaction_time FROM inventory_audit_logs INNER JOIN inventory_transactions ON inventory_audit_logs.transaction_id = inventory_transactions.transaction_id;
